attributes.action: Keep all places of worship open
attributes.additional_details: It’s essential as working or anything else. For people’s mental and spiritual well-being. It’s a human right and fundamental in a democratic society. If people are social distancing and taking preventive measure their is no need to close
attributes.background: Keep all places of worship open for individual and communal worship regardless of any further lockdowns or tiers.

rejection.details: Places of worship are allowed to remain open during the current lockdown, but we could still accept a petition calling on the Government not to close them during future restrictions or lockdowns.
